data.title: Anime News Network
data.text:
Yatagarasu Anime Delays Episode 15 by 3 Weeks Due to Olympics

Episode to air on August 17 ― The official website for the television anime of Chisato Abe's Karasu wa Aruji o Erabanai (The Raven Does Not Choose Its Master) novel, the second novel of her Yatagarasu novel series, confirmed on July 19 that the anime's 15th episode will be delayed by three weeks due to coverage for the 2024 Summer Olympics, which takes place in Paris from July 26 to August 11. The Ol...

SHOSHIMIN: How to become Ordinary Anime Delays Episode 4 by 1 Week

Episode to air on August 3 ― The official website for SHOSHIMIN: How to become Ordinary, the television anime of Honobu Yonezawa's Shōshimin mystery novel series, announced on Sunday that the anime is delaying its fourth episode by one week. The episode will air on August 3 instead of on July 27 as previously scheduled. The anime premiered on the NUMAnimation programming block on the TV Asahi channel...

Wistoria: Wand and Sword Anime Delays Episode 4 by 1 Week

Special with recap, interview, event footage to air on Sunday instead ― The official website for the television anime of Fujino Ōmori and Toshi Aoi's Wistoria: Wand and Sword (Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria) manga announced on Sunday that the anime's fourth episode will not air on the following Sunday, July 28. The episode has been delayed by one week to August 4. The anime will instead air a special na...

The Hungry Succubus Wants to Consume Him Artist Tabireco Launches New Series

Baby Shachu Hackers manga debuts on August 19 ― The August issue of Shueisha's Ultra Jump magazine revealed The Hungry Succubus Wants to Consume Him (Harapeko Succubus wa Ikasetai no ni!) artist Tabireco (or Tabireko) will launch a new series titled Baby Shachu Hackers (Baby in a Car Hackers) in the September issue on August 19. The story follows a high school girl who ends up spending the night in ...

Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2 Anime Reveals Returning English Dub Cast, Premiere

Ernesto Jason Liebrecht, Emily Neves, Emi Lo, return in dub on Wednesday ― Crunchyroll revealed on Tuesday that it will begin streaming the English dub for the second season for the television anime of Kei Sazane and Ao Nekonabe's Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World (Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjō, Arui wa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen) light novel series on July 24. The returning English cast in...

Kumichi Yoshizuki Launches New Manga on July 30

Nankai Trough Kyodai Jishin manga centers on megathrust earthquake ― Kodansha's Magazine Pocket announced on X/Twitter on Monday that Kumichi Yoshizuki will debut a new series titled Nankai Trough Kyodai Jishin (Nankai Trough Megathrust Earthquake) on the platform on July 30. The series explores a realistic depiction of the massive megathrust earthquake Japan has been expecting from the Nankai Trough...

NTV Reveals New Guidelines for Live-Action Productions After Death of Manga Creator Hinako Ashihara

New guidelines include measures to retain faithfulness to original works, with focus on pre-production ― Warning: this article contains statements about a suicide. If you or anyone you know is suicidal or having suicidal thoughts, please reach out to a suicide prevention organization in your country. In the United States, the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline is available by calling 988. In Japan,...

My Hero Academia: You're Next Film's Trailer Highlights Action Scenes

Film opens in Japan on August 2 ― The official website for My Hero Academia THE MOVIE: You're Next (My Hero Academia: You're Next), the fourth anime film in the My Hero Academia franchise, began streaming a new trailer for the film on Tuesday. The trailer, titled "Who's Next," highlights the film's action scenes, and also features the theme song "Homunculus" by Vaundy. The film will open in Japan on ...

Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian Anime Reveals English Dub Cast, Premiere

Sarah Natochenny stars in dub on Tuesday ― Crunchyroll revealed on Monday that it will begin streaming the English dub for the anime of writer Sunsunsun and artist Momoco's Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san) light novel series on Tuesday. The first two dubbed episodes premiere on that day. The English cast includes: Sarah Natochenny ...

daily briefs

Fantagraphics, MSX Publish Atsushi Kaneko's Search and Destroy Manga on July 23

Fantagraphics and Mangasplaining Extra (MSX) will pubish the first volume of Atsushi Kaneko's Search and Destroy manga on Tuesday. Mangasplaining began serializing the manga in the Mangasplaining Extra (MSX) newsletter last August. Paid subscribers to the newsletter can access the manga, and the company will occasionally offer chapters for free to all subscribers. Fantagraphics originally planned ...

I Have a Crush at Work Manga Gets TV Anime

Visual shows main characters of Akamaru Enomoto's Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu manga ― A new official website and X/Twitter account opened on Tuesday to announce that Akamaru Enomoto's I Have a Crush at Work (Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu, also known as Can You Keep a Secret?) manga is getting a television anime. The website unveiled a visual of the main characters Masugu and Yui: Koda...

ICv2 Report: N. American Comics Market Decreased by 7% in 2023

Comics, graphic novel sales totaled roughly US$1.87 billion in 2023, down from US$2.01 billion in 2022 ― Media news website ICv2 announced on July 15 that according to its estimations, comics and graphic novel sales went down approximately 7% in the United States and Canada in 2023. Comics and graphic novel sales to consumers in North America totaled roughly US$1.87 billion in 2023, down from US$2.01...

My Hero Academia: You're Next Film Streams Special Promo Video

Video previews Vaundy's theme song for August 2 film ― The official X/Twitter account for My Hero Academia THE MOVIE: You're Next (My Hero Academia: You're Next), the fourth anime film in the My Hero Academia franchise, began streaming a special promotional video on Monday. The video previews the theme song "Homunculus" by Vaundy. The film will open in Japan on August 2. The film will simultaneously ...

Shueisha Lists Hunter x Hunter Manga Volume 38 for Release on September 4; Yoshihiro Togashi Teases More New Chapters

Manga's 37th volume shipped in 2022 ― Shueisha's website is listing the 38th compiled book volume of Yoshihiro Togashi's Hunter x Hunter manga for release on September 4. Togashi has been teasing updates for upcoming chapters of the manga with posts on X/Twitter. The artist made posts on Monday stating that instructions for the backgrounds were now ready for his assistants for chapters 409-410. If vo...

Dragon Quest Dai no Daibōken: Yūsha Avan to Gokuen no Maō Manga Ends 1st Part

Manga's 2nd part starts on November 21 ― The September issue of Shueisha's V Jump magazine published the final chapter of the first part ("Hero Arc") of Yūsaku Shibata's Dragon Quest Dai no Daibōken: Yūsha Avan to Gokuen no Maō (Dragon Quest The Adventure of Dai: The Hero Avan and the Demon King of Hellfire), the prequel manga of Riku Sanjō and Kōji Inada's Dragon Quest: The Adventure of Dai (Dragon ...

Mahito Aobe's Soshite Akuma wa Seigi o Kataru Manga Ends in August

Manga launched in February 2023 ― The August issue of Square Enix's Gangan Joker magazine revealed on Monday that Mahito Aobe's Soshite Akuma wa Seigi o Kataru (And the Devil Deceives Justice) manga will end in the magazine's next issue on August 22. The school suspense manga centers on an all-boys dormitory school that grooms their students to always do the right thing and be on the side of justice,...

The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army was a Human, Tomo-chan is a Girl, More Anime Get New Indian Language Dubs

Tamil, Telugu dubs stream for all episodes of Tomo-chan Is a Girl!, Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead; Hindi, Tamil, Telugu dubs begin streaming for The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army was a Human ― Crunchyroll began streaming the Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu dubs for the television anime of Ryousuke Hata, original character designer Kuma, and manga artist Anajiro's Maō-gun Saikyō no Majutsus...

Medialink Posts Trailer for Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Beginning of a New Era Film

Film opens in Taiwan on August 2 ― Medialink began streaming an English- and Chinese-subtitled trailer on Friday for Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Shinjidai no Tobira (Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Beginning of a New Era), the new anime film in the Uma Musume Pretty Derby franchise. Medialink will open the film in Taiwan on August 2. The film opened in Japan on May 24. It sold 226,600 tickets and earned 354 mi...

Fate/Extra Record Game Streams Sneak Peek Video, to Reveal New Information on August 4

Remake of Fate/Extra game first announced in 2020 ― The official YouTube channel of Type-Moon studio BB, the Type-Moon game and story development circle's latest game studio, started streaming a "Sneak Peek" video for its Fate/Extra Record game, the remake of Marvelous Entertainment's Fate/Extra PlayStation Portable game, on Monday. The video revealed that staff will reveal new information about the ...

'Toradora!,' Reincarnated as a Sword, Perfect Blue, More Get English Audiobooks in August

Seven Seas also launches The Condemned Villainess Goes Back in Time and Aims to Become the Ultimate Villain, The Evil Queen's Beautiful Principles audiobooks ― Seven Seas Entertainment announced on Thursday that it will release the following English audiobook adaptations of Japanese light novels: Title: Toradora! Creator(s): Yuyuko Takemiya and Yasu Narrator: Cassandra Lee Morris Release date: August...

Guilty Gear Strive Game Adds Cyberpunk: Edgerunners' Lucy, New Character, New Battle Mode in Season 4

Arc System Works also adds new stages, new color, new playable characters on July 22 ― Arc System Works revealed in a teaser trailer for season 4 of the Guilty Gear -Strive- fighting game on Sunday that the game will add Cyberpunk: Edgerunners character Lucy as a playable character along with a new character named Unika, and returning characters Dizzy and Venom. The teaser also previews the "TEAM OF ...

Mission: Yozakura Family Anime Unveils 2 More Cast, New Credit-less Opening Video

fripSide featuring Yoshino Nanjō's 'Secret Operation' opening song debuted in anime's 16th episode on Sunday ― The official website for the anime of Hitsuji Gondaira's Mission: Yozakura Family (Yozakura-san Chi no Daisakusen) manga announces two new cast members on Saturday and Sunday. The anime's staff also started streaming the credit-less opening video featuring the new theme song "Secret Operatio...

Loner Life in Another World Anime Reveals 1st Video, More Cast, Theme Song Artists

Yoshino performs 'ODD NUMBER' opening, Kujiragi performs 'Hello to Goodbye' ending ― The staff for the television anime of Shoji Goji's Loner Life in Another World (Hitoribotchi no Isekai Kōryaku) light novel series revealed the anime's first full promotional video, first key visual, more cast, and the theme songs and artists on Sunday. Yoshino will perform the opening theme song "ODD NUMBER," which ...

'The Most Notorious 'Talker' Runs the World's Greatest Clan' Anime Reveals More Cast

Takehito Koyasu, Shunsuke Sakuya, Yu Wakui join cast of October anime ― Gree Entertainment revealed more cast members for the television anime of Jaki's The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan (Saikyō no Shienshoku "Wajutsushi" dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyō Clan o Shitagaeru) novel series in a new trailer (subtitled in Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, English, and Japanese) on ...

Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four! Manga Gets TV Anime in 2025

Yūki Ono, Konomi Kohara, Akio Ōtsuka star in anime from GEEKTOYS, CompTown ― A website opened on Sunday to announce that a television anime adaptation of Benigashira and Muramitsu's Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four! (Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennō ni Natta Hanashi) manga has been green-lit for next year. Seven Seas published the manga in English, and it describes the st...

Samurai Champloo U.K. Blu-ray Released on Monday

Also separate standard Blu-rays of Gundam film trilogy, Blu-rays of Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear, The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World, I Got a Cheat Skill in Another World and Became Unrivaled in The Real World, Too, Babylon and second half of Mobile Fighter G Gundam ― On Monday July 22, MVM will release a Collector's Blu-ray edition of Shinichiro Watanabe's 2004 series Samurai Champl...

Wistoria: Wand and Sword, Fairy Tail: 100 Years Quest Anime, Tower of God Season 2's English Dubs Stream on July 21

Crunchyroll reveals English dub cast, staff for all 3 titles ― Crunchyroll announced on Friday and Saturday that the English dubs for the television anime adaptation of Fujino Ōmori and Toshi Aoi's Wistoria: Wand and Sword (Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria) manga, the second season the Tower of God anime, and the television anime of Hiro Mashima and Atsuo Ueda's Fairy Tail: 100 Years Quest sequel manga w...

Live-Action Golden Kamuy Series Reveals 7 More Cast, Trailer Video, October 6 Debut

9-episode series is titled Golden Kamuy -Hokkaido Irezumi Shūjin Sōdatsu-hen- ― The official X (formerly Twitter) account for the live-action film of Satoru Noda's Golden Kamuy manga revealed more cast, the trailer video, and the October 6 premiere of the manga's live-action series adaptation titled Golden Kamuy -Hokkaido Irezumi Shūjin Sōdatsu-hen- (Golden Kamuy: The Battle for the Hokkaido Tattooed...

King of Fighters XV Game Adds Mature, Vice in December

2 characters will launch simultaneously as special DLC characters ― SNK revealed on Sunday in a video that it will release "special DLC characters" Vice and Mature in its The King of Fighters XV game simultaneously in December 2024. SNK released the The King of Fighters XV game on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Windows 10, Steam, and the Epic Games Store in February 2022. SNK delayed ...

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves Game Adds Kevin Rian to Lineup

Fighting game launches in early 2025 for PS5/4, Xbox Series X|S, PC ― SNK announced on Sunday that Kevin Rian will join the lineup for its upcoming new fighting game Fatal Fury City of the Wolves. Akihiro Sakata and Jonah Scott voice the character. English Japanese Other returning characters include Terry Bogard, Rock Howard, Tizoc, Hotaru Futaba, Marco Rodrigues, and B. Jenet. The game also includes...

Uzuki Launches in Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes Fighting Game on July 25

Ogre, Izumi also revealed as DLC characters releasing in 2025 ― Arc System Works revealed in a new video on Sunday that it will release the DLC character Uzuki for Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes, the newest installment in French Bread's original Under Night In-Birth 2D fighting game series, on July 25. The character has a trial at the EVO 2024 event this weekend. The video also reveals that Ogre w...

Yuri Hub Announces Ayu Inui's Threads of Me and You Manga Simulpub

Chapter 1 published on July 10 ― The Yuri Hub yuri manga service announced on July 10 it will simulpub Ayu Inui's new manga series Threads of Me and You (Matō Kimi, Hokorobu Watashi). The first chapter published in English on July 12, on the same day as the Japanese release. Chapter 4 will be released on the same day as the Japanese release again. The series is available on Renta!. Yuri Hub describes...

New Samurai Shodown, Art of Fighting Games in Development

SNK posts 'urgent recruitment' notice for both ― Joshua Weatherford revealed during game development studio SNK's panel at EVO 2024 on Friday that a new Samurai Shodown action RPG is in development as well as a new Art of Fighting game. Weatherford stated regarding the new Art of Fighting game that "you're going to see South Town in its full 70s glory brawling again." He stated regarding Samurai Shod...

Pokémon Horizons: The Series Anime Streams in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, English on YouTube

April 2023 anime series premiered on Indian TV on May 25 ― The Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Bengali YouTube channels for Pokémon Asia began streaming the respective local language dubs of the Pokémon Horizons: The Series anime on YouTube on Friday. The new Pokémon South Asia Official English YouTube channel is also streaming the anime with an English dub. The anime premiered on Indian television on Hung...

Tales of Wedding Rings Manga Ends on August 23 (Updated)

Manga launched in 2014; anime adaptation gets 2nd season ― Update on July 20: Monthly Big Gangan announced on X/Twitter on July 20 that the manga will instead end in the September issue on August 23, instead of the August issue on July 25 as it had previously announced. Square Enix apologized for the mistake. ANN's original article is below. The July issue of Square Enix's Monthly Big Gangan magazine...

Code Geass: Rozé of the Recapture Anime's Promo Video Previews 4th, Final Part

Film premieres on August 2, gets screenings with cast in attendance on August 3 ― The staff for the four-part Code Geass: Rozé of the Recapture (originally titled Gode Geass: Z of the Recapture, or Dakkan no Zetto) anime project unveiled a promotional video for the fourth and final part on Saturday: The anime's fourth part will premiere on August 2. There will be screenings with cast members in atten...

Keiko Nishi Launches Sayonara Gohan Manga on August 5

Nishi launches story of an old man reminiscing his gourmet life ― This year's 15th issue of Shogakukan's Big Comic Original magazine revealed on Saturday that Keiko Nishi will launch a new manga titled Sayonara Gohan (Goodbye Meal) in the magazine's next issue on August 5. The manga tells the story of a 70-year-old man who lives alone, as he tries to look back on his splendid(?) gourmet life. Nishi l...

K Manga Licenses I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party! Manga for Simulpub

Nishiki Ogawa, LAgun debuted manga in September 2021 ― Kodansha's K Manga announced on Thursday that it has licensed artist Nishiki Ogawa and writer LAgun's I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party! (S-Rank Party kara Kaiko Sareta "Jugushi": "Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasenga, Sono Seinō wa Artifact-kyū Nari......!) manga for simulpub. The first 36 chapters are available on the platfo...

Live-Action Mitsuya-sensei no Keikakuteki na Ezuke Series Reveals Trailer, Theme Songs, More Cast

Chiaki Kawamo, Ui Mihara, Maya Imamori, Tomomi Maruyama, Shōhei Uno, Kōji Kominami, Kyōko join cast ― The official website for the live-action series of Ayaka Matsumoto's Mitsuya-sensei no Keikakuteki na Ezuke (Mitsuya-sensei's Plan to Feed Me) boys-love manga began streaming two new trailers for the series on Friday. The first trailer below reveals and previews the series' opening theme song "Furito...

Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hōgen Sugite Tsurasugiru Anime Reveals New Cast, Opening Song Artist, Advance Cut Video, January 2025 Debut

Etsuko Kozakura, Tarusuke Shingaki join cast; Okinawan band HY performs opening theme song ― The staff for the television anime adaptation of Egumi Sora's Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hōgen Sugite Tsurasugiru (The Dialect of the Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa is too Difficult to Deal With) manga revealed on Friday two new cast members, the opening theme song artist, an advance cut video, and t...

Arte Manga Ends Soon, Publishes Next Chapter in August

Series enters irregular publishing schedule ― Kei Ohkubo announced on X/Twitter on July 10 that the Arte manga will end in a few chapters. The series will take a break in July, then Tokuma Shoten's Monthly Comic Zenon will publish the next chapter in August. Ohkubo also revealed the manga will enter an irregular release schedule, likely releasing every other month. Comikey publishes the series in En...

My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered Anime Reveals English Dub Cast

David Matranga, Monica Rial, more star in dub on Friday at 1:30 p.m. EDT ― HIDIVE revealed on Thursday the English dub cast for the television anime adaptation of Tsuyoshi Fujitaka's My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered (Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyōsugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga marude Aite ni Naranain Desu ga.) light novel series: David Matranga as Yogiri Monica Rial as Tomochika Joanne Bonasso as Mo...

Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy Game Gets Switch Release in 2024

Touhou Project fan game debuted for PC on April 3 ― Phoenixx confirmed on Thursday that it will release GAMEPULSE's Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy fan game for Nintendo Switch in 2024. The company streamed a trailer: The release will support English and Simplified Chinese. The game features an Arcade mode, Practice Mode, and Challenge Mode boss fights. Phoenixx describes the 2D bullet hell action game: Whe...
